Class LightSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • Actor
      • ch.aplu.raspisim.Part

  • public class LightSensor
extends Part
    Class that represents a light sensor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LightSensor

        public LightSensor(int id)
        Creates a motor instance with given id.
        Parameters:
        id - 0 for front left, 1 for front right, 2 for rear left, 3 for rear right

    • Method Detail

      • addLightListener

        public void addLightListener(LightListener listener,
                    int triggerLevel)
        Registers the given LightListener to detect crossing the given trigger triggerLevel.
        Parameters:
        listener - the LightListener to register
        triggerLevel - the light value used as trigger level

      • addLightListener

        public void addLightListener(LightListener lightListener)
        Registers the given LightListener with default trigger triggerLevel 500.
        Parameters:
        lightListener - the LightListener to register

      • setTriggerLevel

        public int setTriggerLevel(int triggerLevel)
        Sets a new triggerLevel and returns the previous one.
        Parameters:
        triggerLevel - the new trigger triggerLevel
        Returns:
        the previous trigger triggerLevel

      • getValue

        public int getValue()
        Returns the brightness of all torches at the current location; 0, if the sensor is inside a shadow region.
        Returns:
        the sum of the intensity of all torches (in abritrary units)

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns the if of the sensor.
        Returns:
        the sensor id
